pkgmetadata.longdescription: Agreement of Nominal Scale Raters with a Gold Standard // Estimate agreement of a group of raters with a gold standard rating on a nominal scale. For a single gold standard rater the average pairwise agreement of raters with this gold standard is provided. For a group of gold standard raters the approach of S. Vanbelle, A. Albert (2009) doi:10.1007/s11336-009-9116-1 is implemented. Bias and standard error are estimated via delete-1 jackknife.
